Astro toolbox

This module contain AngleDeg class

class astro_toolbox.angle.degrees.AngleDeg(anglevalue: float)

AngleDeg define a Degrees angle with his conversions

degtodms()

Degrees to DMS converting method This method return angle in dms from angle in degrees

Returns

tuple

The angle values in dms

degtohms()

Degrees to HMS converting method This method return angle in hms from angle in degrees

Returns

tuple

The angle values in hms

degtorad()

Degrees to Radians converting method This method return angle in degrees from angle in radians

Returns

float

The angle value in radians

This module contain Equatorial class

class astro_toolbox.coordinates.equatorial.Equatorial(alpha: tuple, delta: tuple, name: Optional[str] = None, magnitude: Optional[float] = None)

This class represent astronomical equatorials coodinates

calculate_airmass(gamma: AngleHMS, location: Location)

Airmass calculation method The airmass is calculate with the Pickering(2002) formula from DIO, The International Journal of Scientific History vol. 12

\[X = \frac{1}{sin(h+\frac{244}{165+47h^{1.1}})}\]

For altitude angle calculation c.f. to_horizontal method

Parameters

gammaAngleHMS

Sidereal Time angle in hms

locationLocation

observer location

Returns

float

Airmass value of the object

compute_on_date_coords(year: float)

On date Equatorial coordinates calculation method from j2000 Equatorial coordinates

\[\Delta year = \frac{(year-2000)}{100}\]
\[M=1.2812323\Delta year+0.0003879\Delta year^2+0.0000101\Delta year^3\]
\[N=0.5567530\Delta year-0.0001185\Delta year^2+0.0000116\Delta year^3\]
\[\Delta \alpha=M+Nsin\alpha tan\delta\]
\[\Delta \delta=Ncos\alpha\]
\[\alpha=\alpha_{J2000}+\Delta \alpha\]
\[\delta=\delta_{J2000}+\Delta \delta\]

Parameters

yearfloat

Current year (months and days can be counted as year fraction)

get_hourangle(gamma: AngleHMS)

Riht-Ascencion to Hour-Angle conversion method

\[HA = RA - \gamma\]

Parameters

gammaAngleHMS

Sidereal Time angle in hms

Returns

AngleHMS

Hour-Angle object at needed time

to_horizontal(gamma: AngleHMS, location: Location)

Equatorial to Horizontal converting method

\[h=sin^{-1}(cos\Phi cos H cos\delta+sin\Phi sin\delta)\]
\[A=sin^{-1}(\frac{-sin H cos \delta}{cosh})\]

Parameters

gammaAngleHMS

Sidereal Time angle in hms

locationLocation

observer location

Returns

Horizontal

Horizontal coordinates of the object

This module contain Horizontal class

class astro_toolbox.coordinates.horizontal.Horizontal(altitude: tuple, azimuth: tuple, name: Optional[str] = None, magnitude: Optional[float] = None)

This class represent horizontals coordinates

calculate_airmass()

Airmass calculation method The airmass is calculate with the Pickering(2002) formula from DIO, The International Journal of Scientific History vol. 12

\[X = \frac{1}{sin(h+\frac{244}{165+47h^{1.1}})}\]

Returns

float

Object airmass

to_equatorial(gamma: AngleHMS, location: Location)

Horizontal to Equation converting method

\[\delta=sin^{-1}(sin \Phi sin h-cos \Phi cos h cos A)\]
\[\alpha=sin^{-1}(\frac{-cosh cosA}{cos\delta})-\gamma\]

Parameters

gammaAngleHMS

Sidereal Time angle in hms

locationLocation

observer location

Returns

Equatorial

Equatorial coordinates of the object

This module contain Location class

class astro_toolbox.coordinates.location.Location(name: Optional[str] = None, latitude: Optional[tuple] = None, longitude: Optional[tuple] = None, elevation: Optional[float] = None)

This class represent the observer location

delete_site()

Method deleting current site from saved sites file

Raises

KeyError

The first level key doesn’t exist

get_site(name: Optional[str] = None)

Method to get a site with it datas

Parameters

namestr, optional

The site name, by default None

Returns

Location

The Location class of the site from his save data in saved sites file

Raises

KeyError

The first level key doen’t exist

ValueError

The site name is not given

save_site()

Method saving current site in sites file

Raises

KeyError

The first level key already exist

update_site()

Method updating current site in saved sites file

Raises

KeyError

The first level key doesn’t exist

This module contain Simbad Class.

class astro_toolbox.query.catalogs.Simbad(object_name: str)

This class allow to read astronomical catalogs over internet.

get_coords()

Get RA/DEC aobject coords.

Returns

Tuple

Tuple wich contain two tuples RA coords and DEC.

get_magnitude()

Get visual magnitude.

Returns

float, None

The object magnitude if available.

get_name()

Get object name.

Returns

str

Object name from Simbad

This module contain AstroDateTime class

class astro_toolbox.time.core.AstroDateTime(ut_time)

This module contain AngleRad class

get_date()

Get date

Returns

tuple

date in format (year,month,day)

get_day()

Get day

Returns

int

day

get_gmst()

UT time to Greenwich mean sidereal time converting method Get Greenwich mean sidereal time

\[gmst=mod(18.697375+24.065709824279(JD-2451545), 24)\]

Returns

tuple

Greenwich mean sidereal time

get_jd()

UT time to Julian day float converting method get Julain day

\[JD=367year-\frac{7(year+\frac{month+9}{12}}{4}>+\frac{275month}{9}+ day+1721013.5+\frac{UT}{24}-0.5sign(100year+month-190002.5)+0.5\]

Returns

float

Julian day

get_lst(location: Location)

UT time to local mean sidereal time converting method Get local mean sidereal time

\[lst=gmst+\frac{\lambda}{15}\]

Parameters

locationLocation

Observer location

Returns

tuple

local mean sidereal time

get_month()

Get month

Returns

int

month

get_time()

Get time

Returns

tuple

time in format (hour,minute,second)

get_year()

Get year

Returns

int

year
